name: Flamingo Cushion
description:
This cushion features a pair of vibrantly hand-painted flamingos on a dark grey background and is digitally printed onto silk. A perfect gift for any bird lover!

The cushion is made from digitally printed silk, and the reverse is hand dyed cotton.
The reverse of the cushion has a handmade button detail and a zip fastening.

Measures approx 48 x 32cm

---

Based on a forest and its inhabitants, this collection of interior products combines hand drawn natural imagery with geometric shapes, and is created with top quality materials including organic cotton and hand dyed silks.

name: Martha Cushion
description:
If you go down to the woods today, you might just catch sight of Martha. She's an inquisitive fox who shares this square cushion with an electric blue geometric corner print.

This cushion is made from digitally printed silk, appliqued onto screen printed organic cotton. The reverse of the cushion has a handmade button detail, and the cushion filling is made from non-allergenic synthetic fibre.
The cushion measures approx 37 x 37cm and has a zip fastening.

---

Based on a forest and its inhabitants, this collection of interior products combines hand drawn natural imagery with geometric shapes, and is created with top quality materials including organic cotton and hand dyed silks.

name: Flamingo Lampshade
description:
This handmade lampshade features a flurry of vibrantly hand-painted flamingos and is digitally printed on to silk.

The shade measures 20cm diameter, 20cm height, and is suitable for table lamps
If you require a fitting suitable for ceiling lights, please leave me a note with your order.

---

Based on a forest and its inhabitants, this collection of interior products combines hand drawn natural imagery with geometric shapes, and is created with top quality materials including organic cotton and hand dyed silks.

name: Macaws Lampshade
description:
This handmade lampshade features a colony of striking Hyacinth Macaws perched on flowering branches, and is made from digitally printed silk.

The unique technique behind this design gives the silk a beautiful visual texture, created from a digital scan of an original piece of hand embroidery sewn with hand-dyed threads.

The shade measures 20cm diameter, 20cm height, and is suitable for table lamps
If you require a fitting suitable for ceiling lights, please leave me a note with your order.

---

Based on a forest and its inhabitants, this collection of interior products combines hand drawn natural imagery with geometric shapes, and is created with top quality materials including organic cotton and hand dyed silks.

name: Wooden Table Lamp [3 woods available]
description:
This wooden table lamp is hand-turned in England to an exclusive design, and looks fantastic in any contemporary or traditional interior.

Fully wired to UK standards with nickel-plated brass fittings, the lamp is currently available in a choice of three woods:

Ash - a pale, creamy coloured wood well suited to many modern interiors

Afromosia - [African Teak] is a light to mid brown colour with beautiful grain patterns

Brown Oak - a slightly darker wood and a traditional choice with beautifully rich colouring 

Height 30cm
Fully wired with nickel-plated brass fittings
